name: Mirrorball
flavorText: "Summoned from beyond the veil of death, and disposed to send its victims back there, the malevolent intelligence within this silver sphere may only be controlled by someone with intense resolve. Once its power is harnessed, however, the ball acts as a loyal enforcer of its master's will." —Deckard Cain
